description: Taxes are the fuel that keeps our government running, but the tax code is also a system of rewards and […]
contentencoded: Taxes are the fuel that keeps our government running, but the tax code is also a system of rewards and incentives – a way of trying to encourage behaviors that Congress wants the rest of us to adopt. For Americans at the bottom of the economic ladder, one of the primary incentives is something called the Earned Income Tax Credit.

title: The Earned Income Tax Credit
